title: Sex Rated
overview: In Sex Rated, open-minded people are reunited with their exes, for the biggest relationship debrief of their lives.Navigating it all is the unshockable Rylan – and talking us through everything from oral sex to BDSM is the UK's sassiest sex educator, Ruby Rare.Expect to hear frank feedback and an honest critique of everything that went on in the bedroom and beyond, as this series lifts the lid on what did – and didn't – happen between the sheets of our former flames!
